answers.answer: what is your BG when you feel bad?
Please also see your dr and ask for thyroid testing.  Being tired like this may possibly be something other than (mild) diabetes.

Sorry I should have also asked what your BG is when you feel good?Many people find that they feel bad when they first start to get control of there BG.  There body is used to high BG so when there BG drops to normal BG there body dont like it.

question: I was diagnosed with Type 2, 3.5 months ago. My Hgb A1C is down to 5.8 no meds, just diet and exercise. I still feel very tired except in the morning for a few hours. As the day goes on I feel worse. Tired, Blurred vision, and dizziness.  Does anyone have any suggestions?  Is this going to get better?
title: Still feeling yucky
